narratives.narrative_name: URW: Blaming the war on others rather than the invader
narratives.evidence_quote: अगर ये देश यूक्रेन को रूस पर हमला करने देंगे तो वे उन देशों पर हमला कर देंगे.
narratives.reasoning: This quote shows Putin holding Western countries (USA/UK) responsible for enabling Ukraine to attack Russia, effectively shifting blame away from Russia for the war.

narratives.evidence_quote: यूक्रेन आक्रामक मूड में है और अमेरिका और ब्रिटेन की मदद से रूस पर ड्रोन हमले कर रहा है.
narratives.reasoning: Describes Ukraine as aggressive and asserts it is supported by the US/UK in attacks on Russia, discrediting Ukraine's actions.

narratives.evidence_quote: अमेरिका और ब्रिटेन पर होगा परमाणु हमला
narratives.reasoning: This heading signals the possibility of a nuclear attack on the US/UK, evoking fear about escalating conflict and nuclear confrontation.

narratives.evidence_quote: इस हालात में रूस कर सकता है परमाणु हमले
narratives.reasoning: States a potential outcome (nuclear attack by Russia) as a consequence of current circumstances, projecting possible escalation.

subnarratives.subnarrative_name: URW: Blaming the war on others rather than the invader: Ukraine is the aggressor
subnarratives.evidence_quote: यूक्रेन आक्रामक मूड में है और अमेरिका और ब्रिटेन की मदद से रूस पर ड्रोन हमले कर रहा है.
subnarratives.reasoning: The text states that Ukraine is in an aggressive mood and, with US/UK support, is carrying out drone attacks on Russia, thereby portraying Ukraine as the aggressor.

subnarratives.subnarrative_name: URW: Blaming the war on others rather than the invader: The West are the aggressors
subnarratives.evidence_quote: नाटो के धमकी के बाद पुतिन का हमला
subnarratives.reasoning: The heading suggests that NATO/Western threats provoked the attack, shifting blame to the Western bloc for escalation.

subnarratives.subnarrative_name: URW: Discrediting Ukraine: Ukraine is a puppet of the West
subnarratives.evidence_quote: यूक्रेन आक्रामक मूड में है और अमेरिका और ब्रिटेन की मदद से रूस पर ड्रोन हमले कर रहा है.
subnarratives.reasoning: The text frames Ukraine as acting under Western influence, with weapons and support from the US/UK enabling attacks on Russia, aligning with the claim that Ukraine is a puppet of the West.

subnarratives.subnarrative_name: URW: Amplifying war-related fears: There is a real possibility that nuclear weapons will be employed
subnarratives.evidence_quote: इनका उपयोग विमान, क्रूज मिसाइलों या ड्रोनों से बड़े पैमाने पर हवाई हमले की स्थिति में किया जा सकता है.
subnarratives.reasoning: The text describes changes to the nuclear doctrine and states that nuclear weapons could be used in the context of large-scale air attacks, signaling a fear of nuclear deployment.

subnarratives.subnarrative_name: URW: Amplifying war-related fears: Russia will also attack other countries
subnarratives.evidence_quote: अगर ये देश यूक्रेन को रूस पर हमला करने देंगे तो वे उन देशों पर हमला कर देंगे.
subnarratives.reasoning: This sentence directly asserts that Russia would retaliate by attacking other countries if they allow Ukraine to attack Russia.
